name: Vanguard of SPLORR!!
description:
BLURB

A game of exploring a strange, non-Euclidian world and dying of thirst (because in my other games, you can die of starvation, and I didn't want to be cliché!)

HOW TO PLAY

Click on words. Things happen. Discover! Hydrate!

DISCLOSURES

Started with my "engine" (i.e. all of the actual game bits ripped out of Freebooter/Seafarer of SPLORR!! until there's just a main menu left, with the ability to render graphics and play sounds.)

Resources used from:

https://game-icons.net/

https://pernyblom.github.io/abundant-music/index.html
